review: So I got the black Friday deal for $113. Probably should have read the product discription a little better, in the picture it showed the remote; which is ver miss leading. In other pictures Apple HDMI cable is shown. I received a $5 cheapo cable. This deal is indeed a rip off!
author: bereakid

review: Wonderful way to enjoy all my digital devices and watch all my favorite tv shows. Easy to hookup.
author: John R. Getty

review: OK, use seldom, but works fine when we do.Not an Apple household, so we don't use the iPhone/Mac interfaces. Don't know if it'll connect to a PC etc.Like all Apple products, it's over priced.
author: Gloria McDonald

review: Great product quality and quick shipping
author: Raie
